name: Marill
flavorText:
The tip of its
tail, which con­
tains oil that is lighter than wa­
ter, lets it swim
without drowning.

previous.name: Bellossom
previous.flavorText:
Plentiful in the tropics. When it
dances, its petals rub together and
make a pleasant ringing sound.

next.name: Azumarill
next.flavorText:
It lives in water virtually all day long.
Its body color and pattern act as
camouflage that makes it tough for
enemies to spot in water.

pokemon.name: Azurill
pokemon.flavorText:
A Pokémon that lives by water.
It moves quickly on land by
bouncing on its big tail.
